member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement
member.summary: Contains the values for the TickPlacement enumeration that determines the placement of the tick representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: Displays the ticks representation at bottom and right side for vertical and horizontal orientation respectively.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.Inline
member.summary: Displays the ticks representation on the track.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.None
member.summary: Hides the ticks representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.Outside
member.summary: Displays the ticks representation outside to the track.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Displays the ticks representation at top and left side for vertical and horizontal orientation respectively.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation
member.summary: Contains the values for the Orientation enumeration that determines the orientation of the control either vertical or horizontal.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Represents the control in horizontal orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation.Vertical
member.summary: Represents the control in vertical orientation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement
member.summary: Contains the values for the ValuePlacement enumeration that determines the placement of the value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Displays the values representation at top and left side for vertical and horizontal orientation respectively.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: Displays the values representation at bottom and right side for vertical and horizontal orientation respectively.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo
member.summary: Contains the values for the SnapsTo enumeration that restricts range snaps movement.

member.summary: Thumbs interval movement depends on step value.

member.summary: Thumbs interval movement depends on tick value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo.None
member.summary: Thumbs interval movement is 1.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement
member.summary: Contains the values for the ToolTipPlacement enumeration that determines the placement of the tool tip representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Displays the tool tip at top and left side for vertical and horizontal orientation respectively.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement.BottomRight

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SfRangeSlider
member.summary: represents a control that allows users select a range of values within the specified limits.
member.remarks: Range Slider control allows the user to select the range of value within the specified minimum and maximum limit. The range can be selected by moving the thumb along a track.
